    <player>
    # This is used when not warping from a prior map
        <player_start_tile>2 21 </player_start_tile>
        <player_start_rotation>1.5708</player_start_rotation>
    </player>

    <portals>
        # These are used when warping from a prior map
        # Portal number, map from database name, and portal, tile location x, y, player face direction
        # 0.0000 - Face south
        # 1.5708 - Face east
        # 3.1416 - Face north
        # 4.7124 - Face west
        <portal>1 map_name 0 2 16 0</portal>
    </portals>

    <events>
        # Event number, type, tile x, y, trigger tile x, y, database map name, repeat
        # Type 1: trigger object on tile
        # Type 2: map warp event
    </events>

    <rooms>
        # roomTypeNone         =  0, // None / empty
        # roomTypeCell         =  1, // Prison Cell
        # roomTypeSecret       =  2, // Secret room
        # roomTypeStairwell    =  3, // Stairwell
        # roomTypeStore        =  4, // Store
        # roomTypeBlacksmith   =  5, // Blacksmith
        # roomTypeCanteen      =  6, // Canteen
        # roomTypeStorage      =  7, // Storage room
        # roomTypeLibrary      =  8, // Library
        # roomTypeAlchemyLab   =  9, // Alchemy Lab
        # roomTypeLaboratory   = 10, // Laboratory
        # roomTypeTorture      = 11  // Torture Chamber
        #Tile x, y, (any within the room), type, ignore room number (use for the interconnecting route, -1 for none)
    </rooms>

    <npc_mobs>
        # database name, number, scale min, scale max, prevalence
        <npc_mob>spider_leader_1 0 0.9 1.0 5 none 0</npc_mob>
    </npc_mobs>

    <debris_objects>
        # database name, scale min, scale max, prevalence
        <debris>bones 0.5 1 40 none 0</debris>
    </debris_objects>

    <npcs>
        # database name, number, tile x, y, scale x, y, z, rotation x, y, z
    </npcs>

    <objects>
        # database name, number, tile x, y, scale x, y, z, rotation x, y, z, trigger tile x, y, trigger event number
    </objects>

</map>
